prod_short_desc: Hammer the enemy into defeat with Ultimate Flama!
prod_long_desc:
Ultimate LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets feature awesome action minifigures with epic battle gear. Turn the wheel to swing the gigantic hammer up and down, then use the slime cannon stud shooter and spinning ice disc in battle against the knights. This set features 3 scannable shields for NEXO Powers that provide unique battle skills in the digital game, and includes an Ultimate Flama minifigure.
Includes an Ultimate Flama minifigure.
Ultimate Flama merges live-action play with 3 scannable shields to obtain unique NEXO Powers for digital gaming.
Weapons include a sword, hammer, slime stud shooter and a spinning ice disc.
Accessory elements include a shield, 3 extra studs for the slime stud shooter and a showcase stand.
Turn the wheel to activate the swinging hammer function.
Fire a slime element into the air with the stud shooter.
This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 7-14.
Stands over 2” tall.
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents' or guardians' permission before going online.
Scan shields for each of the 3 NEXO Powers (Flame Wreck, Slime Blast and Ice Dragon) and power up in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game.
Collect and combine all the Ultimate LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets to boost your collection of ultimate battle gear.
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ episodes on Cartoon Network.
